mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.office AS "office.id", a.owner_depart AS "ownerDepart", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.project_id AS "projectId", a.project_name AS "projectName", office.name AS "office.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office office ON office.id = a.office
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cover_office_owner( id, create_by, update_by, update_date, del_flag, office, owner_depart, create_date, remarks, project_id, project_name ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{office.id}, #{ownerDepart}, #{createDate}, #{remarks}, #{projectId}, #{projectName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cover_office_owner SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, office = #{office.id}, owner_depart = #{ownerDepart}, remarks = #{remarks}, project_id = #{projectId}, project_name = #{projectName} WHERE id = #{id}
